mapper.sql: id, type, title, content, enclosure, attachment_source, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag
mapper.insert: insert into cginformation (id, type, title, content, enclosure, attachment_source, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cginformation
id,
type,
title,
content,
enclosure,
attachment_source,
yhzh,
createId,
createTime,
delflag,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select count(1) from cginformation where delflag = 'A'
and yhzh like concat('%', #{page.yhzh}, '%')
and title like concat('%', #{page.key}, '%')
and type like concat('%', #{page.type}, '%')
and createTime > #{page.startTime}
and createTime < #{page.endTime}
and createId like concat('%', #{page.createId}, '%')
mapper.update: update cginformation set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cginformation set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enclosure = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into cginformation (type, title, content, enclosure, attachment_source, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag) values (#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select distinct a.type,ifnull(b.count,0) as value from cginformation as a left join( select type,count(1) as count from cginformation where delflag = 'A' group by type)as b on a.type=b.type
